com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Interface ResourceRequestAuthenticator


  • public interface ResourceRequestAuthenticator
    Authenticates a client request to an API resource (URI) endpoint based on the presence of an OAuth Access Token in the request. This interface reflects the Builder design pattern to allow customization of how the authentication attempt is processed. For example: 
     AuthenticationResult result = application.authenticateOauthRequest(httpRequest)
   .inLocation(RequestLocation.HEADER, RequestLocation.BODY)
   .execute();
    Since:
    1.0.RC
    See Also:
    application.authenticateOauthRequest(httpRequest), execute()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OauthAuthenticationResult execute()
      Authenticates the OAuth request using a bearer Access Token and returns a corresponding result.
      ResourceRequestAuthenticator inLocation(RequestLocation... locations)
      Specifies the location(s) where the OAuth bearer access_token will be checked.

    • Method Detail

      • inLocation

        ResourceRequestAuthenticator inLocation(RequestLocation... locations)
        Specifies the location(s) where the OAuth bearer access_token will be checked. Once found, the token will be used to authenticate the OAuth request. Unless configured via this method, the default locations that will be checked are the RequestLocation.HEADER and RequestLocation.BODY. See RequestLocation for more information.
        Parameters:
        locations - the location(s) where the OAuth bearer access_token will be checked.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
        See Also:
        RequestLocation

      • execute

        OauthAuthenticationResult execute()
        Authenticates the OAuth request using a bearer Access Token and returns a corresponding result. The result type may be either a OauthAuthenticationResult or a AccessTokenResult. See application.authenticateOauthRequest(httpRequest) for more information.
        Returns:
        the result of the authentication attempt.
